SELECT a.uuid as uuid, a.product_picture as productPicture, a.commodity_name as commodityName, a.release_time as releaseTime, a.price as price, a.user_id as userId, a.staus as staus
FROM commodity_table a WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{userId}
AND a.commodity_name like concat (concat ('%',#{commodityName}),'%')
ORDER BY staus DESC
